name: Bungee Jump Challenge
description:
Enjoy the thrill of bungee jumping on your iPhone or iPad.

Tilt the top edge of your iPhone forward to lean over the edge of the bridge and start your jump. Rotate iPhone to left or right to steer side to side. Try to pop all 3 red balloons during a single jump while swinging back and forth.

Select from three different difficulty levels and camera views.

One or two players locally can take turns.

Optionally shares your accomplishments with Facebook, Twitter, Weibo, email, or instant messaging.

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, and iPhone 5 displays.

YouTube video: http://youtu.be/GT0hUu--TZo
